FuncDef: This command specifies the primary and optional backup location where the log or billing file will be created.

ParaDef.Info: Specify the primary location. Values-cflash-id:	cf1:, cf2:, cf3:.
Specify the secondary location. Values-cflash-id: 	cf1:, cf2:, cf3:.

ExtraInfo: Default: Log files are created on cf1: and accounting files are created on cf2:
